contents.item: Living in active consciousness is being in the “here and now
Human existence is as a result of the evolution of time
Serving people is more important to God than the religious activities we engage in
Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
Being dynamic doesn’t necessarily mean you live an effective life
Losing your job brings you closer to your destiny
The doctrine of waiting for confirmation is one of the greatest time killers
To live an effective life, you have to turn your back on the things of the world
You cannot understand God without understanding people
When you are intense, you will do things persistently and with speed
When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
The life in our possession is our time
Time wasters are life wasters
God accepts us into His atmosphere when we accept people into our lives
Celebrate people irrespective of their status or position
Life is given for increase and multiplication of the glory of God
The only limitation we have is the limitation of the mind
Always celebrate people for who they are
Joblessness is a rare privilege
Things done for self don’t count in living an effective life
Don’t go in the opposite direction, locate your calling
Love is about sharing
Greatness is an attainment bought with the currency of time
Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
Live your life for the advancement of the Kingdom
Work to fulfill your calling
Living a selfish life is a recipe for disaster
Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
Work is an instrument through which you build yourself
If your idea is not against your conscience or the will of God, go for it
Discovering yourself is the major key to being successful
Fellowship with human beings opens up to fellowship with God
The purpose of life has eternal consequences
Don’t waste time on employment, discover yourself today
Everyone should be seen as a carrier of God’s nature
Salary is the currency that is gotten from mortgaging your life and time
The key to an effective life is that things done for self don’t count
Don’t neglect your calling all in the name of employment
Money does not determine our worth
Don’t betray the purpose of your creation
Every fragment of time that passes daily must be converted for it to be fully effective
When you begin to serve people, salvation locates you
Living a fruitful and purposeful life has eternal blessings
It’s not about who they are, but about God’s principle
Fellowshipping with people is life
Self-denial is the first quality of love
Don’t waste your youthful and active days on employment
The only way to practicalize your love for God is by helping and loving others
You are living to the fullest when you live to discover and fulfill your purpose
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
Your calling is your destiny
You get divine blessings when you love and cherish both those who love and hate you
Life should be an investment in yourself
Uplifting God’s Kingdom on earth should be our life’s mandate as believers
The material of life is made from time
Never exchange your life for a penny
Life is supposed to be used in fulfilling our individual purposes of creation
Reproduce yourself and fulfill your calling
Purpose is the most important thing worth living for
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
Don't mistake activity with achievement.
Serve the Lord with what you have — your substance, strength, knowledge, and ability
Open your eyes to new opportunities
You need intensity to be quick
Brotherly love should be our number one principle as believers
A life without increase, production and multiplication is a wasted one
Man is the carrier of God’s image
We glorify God when we celebrate people’s gifts
Become great through the currency of time
See the light in losing your employment
The best kind of happiness is a habit you're passionate about.
The nature of Christ is love
You values are your life’s worth
The world system is employment
Fellowship and interaction with people opens up God’s heart to us
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
God is a God of glory
The principle of God is love
You have to be purposeful and intense to reclaim your lost years
As a believer, you need to take responsibility of the Kingdom of God on earth
The image of God is in every human
God can only relate effectively with you when you relate with people
We should see our calling as our life’s major assignment
Work is designed to be a means of fulfilling your destiny
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
People-based service is God-based service
Love is your service to humanity
